1.16.4.2.0.0: Mod no longer adds silk touch to items on crafting, and they harvest all glass without silk touch (Still uses tags minecraft:glass and minecraft:glass_panes as before to support modded glass).  The basic recipe uses iron instead of quartz now.  Port to 1.16.3 and latest forge RB
1.16.4.2.0.1: pt_br language translation added by Mikeliro
